member.name: T:Steema.TeeChart.Drawing.GL.TeeOpenGL
member.summary: OpenGL environment housing class The TeeOpenGL component is placeable to set a Chart to OpenGL rendering. TeeOpenGL provides access to the OpenGL Canvas and Light sources.

member.summary: Use Activate to set the Chart to OpenGL.

member.summary: Setting Active to true enable OpenGL for the Chart.

member.summary: Selects TChart to which the TOpenGL Component is linked.

member.name: P:Steema.TeeChart.Drawing.GL.TeeOpenGL.DrawStyle
member.summary: Sets the OpenGL PolygonMode for rendering as, for example, POINT, LINE, or FILL.

member.name: P:Steema.TeeChart.Drawing.GL.TeeOpenGL.Shininess
member.summary: Sets the brilliance of the shininess on a rendered surface. Values 0 to 1. 0 for highest shininess, 1 for lowest.

member.name: P:Steema.TeeChart.Drawing.GL.TeeOpenGL.FontOutlines
member.summary: When true renders Fonts as outlines only, no fill.

member.summary: The Font Z Depth applied to Font characters.

member.name: P:Steema.TeeChart.Drawing.GL.TeeOpenGL.AmbientLight
member.summary: Default 8. The percentage ( from 0 to 100 ) of ambient light. Default 8. Ambient light is a global light that comes from all directions.
